website_summaries.verdict: This device offers a proven option to treat chronic neck pain.
pros: One-size-fits-all design ensures the device will fit men, women, and children
Stretches the neck muscles to help alleviate pressure
Long straps and hook-and-loop fasteners guarantee you can wear the device securely at all times
cons: May stop inflating, even after minimal use
Sometimes squeezes the neck too tight

customer_reviews.title: Save physical therapy money and do it yourself. Worth every cent
customer_reviews.text: $30 co pay after insurance 3 times a week to have a physical therapist to do this. I'm on a limited budget. This does the exact same thing. You people being "choked" make me laugh. Blow it up in small and ever increasing amounts till you can feel the relief pull. Some of you really need to buck up. This nation is becoming a bunch of pansies. You won't get relief from doing nothing! Start loose several times a day and slowly increase. I can't tell you how many times i have felt such relief I fell asleep!
customer_reviews.author: sa

customer_reviews.title: Loved the extended straps!
customer_reviews.text: I've had degenerative disc disease for 18 years. My doctor prescribed the over the door unit, but I don't want to stare at a wall when treating. I like the idea of mobility. A friend told me about this product. I was skeptical at first, but it really does work and provides relief. I chose this one because of the one size fits all, storage bag and warranty. My only word of caution is be carefull on the times of traction...second time using it, it was too much relief and I fell asleep for an hour on my couch when using. Now I set a timer!
customer_reviews.author: Bill Gamble

customer_reviews.title: This traction device is great. I had a problem with the first device ...
customer_reviews.text: This traction device is great. I had a problem with the first device received, but Trusted Solutions answered my email the same day. They immediately sent another Neck Traction Device of which I received in two days. I have a pinched nerve causing my arm to tingle and my neurologist recommended this specific neck device. I wear it twice a day for 20 minutes. It feels so good I actually keep it on a few more minutes. I would definitely recommend the Trusted Cervical neck Traction Device.
customer_reviews.author: Lainey

customer_reviews.title: it arrived in excellent condition. And if you could just take a ...
customer_reviews.text: Our feedback is listed below: Did you get it? Yes, it arrived in excellent condition. And if you could just take a minute, hit reply to this email and tell me, what do you think of it so far? It seems to work as advertised, and seems to be of high quality. One aspect of the instruction sheet could be upgraded. The section that describes moving the bearing in and out of the tube air path is a little confusing. We figured it out, and it works great, to plug and unplug the air line to prevent leakage, but it took us a little time. Thank you for providing a high quality product! Best regards, Dennis
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: So Far....So Good
customer_reviews.text: Ordered on advice from my Chiropractor, had 3 cervical discs replaced 20+ years ago and now feeling the dull ache down my arms and loss of rotation in neck. Almost as bad as before surgery. My first two uses of the collar have been very positive, I’m anticipating this device will actually help. I’ll give the device 5 stars based on my initial use.
customer_reviews.author: wagondog

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about the Trusted Cervical Neck Traction Device. I have had chronic neck problems for many years. My physical therapist suggested purchasing a traction device. She told me they are "pricey" but may be helpful. This device is NOT pricey and has helped me so much! It is a very clever and simple design and has reduced the pain and numbness I have been experiencing. I use it twice a day and I am sleeping better and experience less pain throughout the day. Thank you for creating such a wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Olson-Bauman

customer_reviews.title: I don’t like being tricked into buying something because it gives the ...
customer_reviews.text: One of the main reasons I decided to purchase this item was that I thought it was made in the US. In the description is says "Family Owned & Operated U S Company”. When I received the item it had a sticker on it that said “Made In China”. I don’t like being tricked into buying something because it gives the impression of being made in the US.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Found definite relief, but caused jaw/teeth pain
customer_reviews.text: I really believe this product helped me until recently I've developed severe jaw pain. I have a pinched nerve in C6, and I faithfully used this 3-4 times a day for approximately 3 weeks. I always found relief in the C6 and shoulder area after each use, but after this extended use, the pain in my jaw because quite severe. When inflating, it puts a tremendous about of pressure under the chin. It now hurts to even put pressure on my teeth. This is disappointing because I really liked the product. I think I have caused a second problem while trying to relieve the first. I have discontinued use and will not use it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: WK

customer_reviews.title: My Neurologist recommend I try.
customer_reviews.text: Update, within a few weeks device stopped holding air. I was NOT given an opion to try again, nor did they offer to replace only refund. To be fair I did enjoy this product completely given the brief experience I had with it. And I did recommend it to a friend who purchased it as is currently enjoying it. And the company did reach out afterwards to apologize for the miscommunication. UPDATE. I STAND COMPLETELY CORRECTED. THIS AN EXTRORDINARY CUSTOMER SERVICE FOCUSED COMPANY. IT'S TO BAD THERE ISN'T MORE COMPANIES WITH THEIR VALUES.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Use to immobilize your neck comfortably
customer_reviews.text: This product can be used if you hurt your neck and need comfortable support.the on off valve is in the black rubber pipe about half way (u will see a bump you have to push a little steel stopper to close and open for inflation. It works but is a bit odd. That makes it so you can unhook the bulb and set screw so u dont need to have that hanging. Works well for immobilizing your neck its very adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: TestrA+

customer_reviews.title: The best purchase I have ever made!
customer_reviews.text: I can't begin to tell you how bad my chronic neck pain was...life was unbearable with it. When I went looking for a product to help I came across this model by TRUSTED and read every review and research about it and decided to buy it. Every single positive thing I read about this device is 100% accurate. EXCELLENT customer service, you won't find a better company, I'm sure. Very easy to use and store. Works AMAZING! So compact...take it anywhere, instant relief!!
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Brady

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad
customer_reviews.text: I think for my circumstance, my Cervical Stenosis needed some thing more stronger? Months ago while at therapy they used a Traction device that worked in a similar way but pulled my neck worth 30 lbs of weight which gave me a lot of relief. I may have to upgrade to another device that comes close to a Traction.
customer_reviews.author: dadellman

customer_reviews.title: This Device Really Works.
customer_reviews.text: I waited a few weeks before I wrote the review so I could provide accurate feedback. I was having some neck issues before I made this purchase. Past x-rays shows my cervical spine to have issues. I was doing some strengthening issues when I must have over done it or done something too extreme. I noticed improvement 2-3 days after using device twice daily for 25 minutes. The problem was mostly gone at the 7 day point. After 10 days of usage my neck feels better than it has in a long time and the little tweak I did is completely gone. Very effective product.
customer_reviews.author: Mark McMurtry

customer_reviews.title: Amazing pain relief
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. I have a pinched nerve and ruptured c5 c6. I have not had to take pain meds since I got it. I wear it 3 to 4 times a day for 20 to 30 mins. Ask for neck size I have a large neck and it fits fine with room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: B. Bad

customer_reviews.title: improved velcro straps, moved to a more effective angle and larger with more grip
customer_reviews.text: vendor followed up with my order personally via email, this is the second traction device i have bought, the first one i used frequently and the velcro lost its holding power due to size and angle of grip. this one i ordered because it had larger velcro straps, and it has proven to be superior in its holding power. Came with a nice storage bag which will make traveling with it easier, with this you could through away those u shaped travel pillows.
customer_reviews.author: roger wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Provided relief
customer_reviews.text: My husband has cervical spondylosis, which keeps him up at night and causes a lot of pain. I bought this after searching and was very skeptical based on how inexpensive and simple it is. He was skeptical because he has a larger neck and dress shirts usually can’t button, but this was big enough. The look of relief on his face when he tried if the first time was worth much more than I paid for it. It helped a lot immediately. He was leaving on a trip the next day and said it was definitely coming with him. I am hopeful that daily use will provide even more relief.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Skiba

customer_reviews.title: Cervical device
customer_reviews.text: Very excited about this product. Had a car wreck when i was 20 years old. So i have been to chiropractors for much of my life. I am feeling better all ready and over time i think my neck will be curved normally.
customer_reviews.author: Breezy

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made product. It's easy to use, comfortable and best of all does not leak air. This is something I'd use even if I didn't have a neck problem, maybe on a long plane flight. (Just wouldn't inflate it as much as I do for the neck stretch.) Also comes with a storage/travel pouch and very clear instructions. Overall very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: P. Joseph

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: At my doctor's appointment last week he suggested that I try this neck traction device to relieve intense pain from a pinched nerve in my upper back. I have only used this product for about a week, but the pain from the pinched nerve has subsided to the point that I am able to sleep at night. Before this week I was waking up at least every two hours with intense nerve pain in my arms. I am hoping it continues to improve. It was definitely well worth trying and would recommend trying before using invasive methods.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene A Murray

customer_reviews.title: Arthritis Pain
customer_reviews.text: This works really well to alleviate the pain in my moms neck caused by arthritis. Her doctor recommended her to try this type of device. She has been using for over a week now and it has showed to make a huge improvement in her comfort and mobility.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: This product gives me the same results - I was amazed. I love it
customer_reviews.text: I have had a pinched nerve in my neck from a fall for several years. Neck traction at physical therapy helps the most but it is expensive to go to PT sessions on a regular basis. This product gives me the same results - I was amazed. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helped with my neck issues
customer_reviews.text: I had neck problems from over strenuous activity. This helped with that significantly. Work up to longer times and use according to directions. Comes with a pouch for travel and I'm considering using it as a travel neck pillow since it's inflatable to whatever you need and may work better than the typical ones I've tried. I did have problems with the pump hose connection to the pillow itself but they aren't insurmountable. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LEH

customer_reviews.title: Convenience and Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I have a traction kit that I use daily, lying on the floor, but this is nice to use when I'm sitting in a chair. After I'm done using it I hand it to my husband who uses it also. So far, we both like it. We tuck a microfiber cloth under our chin and up against our neck so as to not dirty the fabric with body oils, or lotion, or make-up. And it still works just fine. I know you'll enjoy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Deana Jean

customer_reviews.title: It will work
customer_reviews.text: The bottom line is this device does work. Good quality, holds air. Very easy and simple to use. It does relieve my pain while in use. Although my pain usually returns within an hour after using. I think with continuous use it will solve my neck problems. I hope.
customer_reviews.author: William Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Neck Traction Device
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my husband and it arrives yesterday. He had the older one called, "Dr. Bob". Used it for years because it really helped relieve his neck pain, although, 'Dr. Bob' was made of a very hard plastic. He is using this Neck Traction Device right now and says it is much more comfortable. It has a great 2-year warranty also!
customer_reviews.author: italianized

customer_reviews.title: Can be too tight around neck
customer_reviews.text: I do not know about others, but when I tried it, as it pushed upwards, it also contracted around my neck and felt like the bloodflow was being restricted to my head. There was the sensation of being strangled. The manufacturer was prompt in refunding my money after I explained my issue so I have no problem with their customer service. Perhaps it works better for others, but it was not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph C. Aimetti

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable to use
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this to keep my head upright while reading and looking at an iPad preventing neck strain while looking down. I've found that if pumped up enough, it supports the head enough to take pressure off of your spine and, for me, correct my neck posture.
customer_reviews.author: B. Burke

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a joke. It does absolutely nothing like it says.
customer_reviews.author: lollie4281

customer_reviews.title: Great For People who Work on a computer
customer_reviews.text: As someone who edits video for hours at a time this was the perfect solution to re-align my neck and posture. It is important to remember this is a device that takes a few times to get the hang of it - but once I was able to read the instructions provided and practice it worked great. I think it will be the bridge between my scheduled massage and chiropractor appts to keep my alignment together ha.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: All negatives due to false advertising
customer_reviews.text: The product works great. I almost returned it due to the fact that the pictures imply that the product is made in the USA but is actually made in China. I would have bought it regardless of the country of origin. I do not like being lied to or at least being decieved.
customer_reviews.author: Mark J Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Goes with me to the office
customer_reviews.text: This product works to keep my neck elevated and not in the constant “ looking down” position. I like that i can wear it in my office and remove it when, I want to.
customer_reviews.author: StevenDR.

customer_reviews.title: One size doesn't fit all
customer_reviews.text: The idea seems simple enough but the collar has to fit to work. The one size fits all doesn't work well for me with a 20 inch neck that is shorter rather than taller. The collar doesn't lift my jaw, but rather surrounds it and has a lot of open space in the front. I've looked for similar sized collars and have found none, this bragged of longer straps but still a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!! Worked great on my strained neck and tension headaches!
customer_reviews.text: The first device I got worked great in relieving the tension in my neck except the bulb would not stay on...alittle annoying but since it still worked, I didn’t feel the need to send it back. I sent the company an email with concerns of the faulty bulb (just to let them know but not really wanting to deal with the hassle of mailing mine back for a replacement). They sent me a new device the next day and allowed me to keep the old one as backup! Great product. Great customer service! Great company! I’ll be sure to buy more things from them in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I have scoliosis of the neck and so I always want a nice stretch. This product really helped even out the tonality of my neck while giving it a good stretch. It’s a bit uncomfortable to wear but the effects of what it does are worth it.
customer_reviews.author: CHL87

customer_reviews.title: Love it. I have old sports injuries and this ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I have old sports injuries and this provides great relief without having to constanly go to the doctor. I recommend starting out with only a few minutes at first and ease into it. Great quality...I'll tell all of my friends dealing with upper back and neck pain, for sure. Sincerely, thank you, to whoever came up with this idea.
customer_reviews.author: C.D.

customer_reviews.title: Slow to fill. Hurts me to use.
customer_reviews.text: Might just be my disk issues but this hurts everything to use. Super slow to fill with air. Gave it away
customer_reviews.author: Kev

customer_reviews.title: Great for neck pain.
customer_reviews.text: My husband was having a lot of neck pain along with headaches. Within one week of using this device, he has had great relief with no headaches after working 8 hours on computers. He carries it with him when he travels. Easy to pack.
customer_reviews.author: ncg

customer_reviews.title: Low quality hose didn’t last
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and effective. The only downside was the rubber hose was such low quality that it fell apart after a couple years. It did leak somewhat for a long time before it broke.
customer_reviews.author: Fdavet

customer_reviews.title: I waited 25 days for a review
customer_reviews.text: Well, I used this since May 6 when I got this product and I wanted to try for 21 days to see if this works with decompressing my neck sublixation. Safe to say, it didn’t work very well. I think it gives you a slight feel of your head feeling lighter but for people who deal with lesser issues than my own it could work perfect. But for stuck vertebrae, nope, not a chance. I want my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Only a couple days, but it feels like it is helping.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it based on the reviews. Odd looking but the comfortable controlled lift does provide some relief.
customer_reviews.author: Stryker ET

customer_reviews.title: Neck relieve
customer_reviews.text: My doctor recommended me buy a cervical neck traction so I started searching and I saw this one was FDA certified so I bought it. It’s great!!! I use it while watching tv and it helps a great deal, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Cente

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Company!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I found relief after the first couple of uses. Well made, and customer service emailed me to make sure everything was ok with the device. In these days of poor customer service, this was very refreshing.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great product, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This works like a champ, after only 4-5 uses already felt the improvement in my neck, the softness is very nice also, my previous cervical collar was made of a hard rubber, I'm impressed. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Lucinda Foster

customer_reviews.title: Don't be fooled, this is not made in the USA!
customer_reviews.text: I am writing this before I have actually used the product. I just received it today & am very disappointed to see that what I thought (because of the large tag shown in the picture that says USA company) was made in the USA is actually made in China. I specifically ordered this because I thought it was made in America. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: It cuts off your blood flow to your brain.
customer_reviews.text: You need to have it snug in order for it to work. If it’s not tight enough it does nothing, to tight you get light headed. I’ve tried to keep the bottom/top strap undone or loose and it still finds a way to make you feel weak. I wouldn’t suggest this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Wulf

customer_reviews.title: Helps a bit
customer_reviews.text: Can’t overinflate this. Does help provide a little traction and allow me to relax my neck while in traction.
customer_reviews.author: nrc

customer_reviews.title: my dad loves this product!
customer_reviews.text: my dad loved this product so much that he ordered it again to have an extra one in case something happens to the one he purchased some time ago. he uses it on daily basis, at least once a day and together with some basic neck stretching exercises he has seen significant improvement in his neck. even his doctor observed more vertebrae separation on his latest x-ray image and told him to continue using the device.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Definitely alleviates neck pain. Good quality!
customer_reviews.author: S. SICA

customer_reviews.title: Relieves pain and headaches while using
customer_reviews.text: Item is of good quality and soft. Mechanisms work well and easily. I have been in pain for years, and decided to try this. While using, I can say it does relieve pain and headaches and gives me Relief from these symptoms, which I endure on a daily basis 24 hours a day. I am quite satisfied and am thankful for the relief I do receive from it.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: That's good I would recommend it
customer_reviews.text: It works okay for what it's supposed to do I guess I expected a little more but I guess I shouldn't have. It helps but it's not excellent
customer_reviews.author: Mags Elliott

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.text: Helped my neck pain immediately. I had pain for 1-2 weeks. Saw a chiropractor also. After 1st use it relieved the pai. Getting used to the ball bearing check valve was a bit difficult. Contacted manufacturer and had an immediate response. They sent another attachment that helped me understand it better.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry vernosh

customer_reviews.title: This device has definately helped my neck pain.
customer_reviews.text: I received this device about a month ago and use it several times per week. My neck is tight and painful after work and I have definitely felt relief when using it for 5-10 minutes at a time. I am also getting PT and doing a lot of stretching, but I have days I get instant relief just using the traction device. It arrived quickly and the product is very well made. I'm glad to have this as a tool in my arsenal for combating my chronic neck pain.
customer_reviews.author: Remona Blevins

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of medical equipment
customer_reviews.text: I have several herniated disks in my neck and cannot be cardio cleared for surgery. My Primary Care Doctor suggested this device and it works fantastic. I have sever pain after any activity and with a 20 minute session I experience a good deal of relief. I am really glad I made the small investment to purchase this product. BTW, Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!!
customer_reviews.text: Whenever my neck is sore, this is a tremendous help! Awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: Suzette

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: My wife has been suffering for months with neck pain after a motorcycle wreck.. The Cervical traction device relives the pressure and she is now able to get sleep at night.. What a great product.. !!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Hein

customer_reviews.title: Very effective
customer_reviews.text: I have had long term neck and shoulder pain. Started using this a few weeks ago. Absolutely notice the difference. I missed one day, and could tell the following morning, as my pain was back.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Helpful, comfortable and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This traction device is easy to use, soft and comfortable, comes with a travel bag, has long adjustable straps and although I have only used it a handful of times so far, it seems very helpful. I just had cervical disc replacement surgery at two levels in December and have residual spasm. I receive traction in therapy but it's not enough. This is really helping.
customer_reviews.author: Kim K.

customer_reviews.title: Good, so far ...
customer_reviews.text: The velcro connections are stronger than with other collars I've purchased. We'll see how long this one is able to hold its air.
customer_reviews.author: kabrophy

customer_reviews.title: US owned and operated - superb customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent customer service from this company. Collar works well, easily adjusts.
customer_reviews.author: Lisbeth Holm

customer_reviews.title: Too large
customer_reviews.text: This product is hard to secure. It is too large because I have a short neck. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Works great and so inexpensive!
customer_reviews.text: I've been seeing the chiropractor for 8 months religiously. I was still having bouts of pain down my right and left arm. The chiropractor suggested one of these collars to help create more space between my discs. Since using this collar, I have been out of pain with much better movement in my neck. I would highly recommend it. It take only a few minutes at a time with great results!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Kosmin

customer_reviews.title: SURPRISED HOW WELL THIS WORKS and SO FAST.
customer_reviews.text: Received this item at 8 AM and was utilizing it by 9:30 AM Had it inflated as per instructions and wore it for one half hour It had an immediate affect on my neck right after use. Very pleased with the result so far. Never expected such a quick relief after one use. Will be utilizing it as per instructions for the next several weeks on a daily basis. Simple concept that works works works.
customer_reviews.author: STEPHEN M MEYERS

customer_reviews.title: I will continue to use this.
customer_reviews.text: I've used it twice and it relaxed my neck muscles and helped the discomfort I was feeling in my neck.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This works really well. I had the kind you hung from the door. Well it’s time to pack that one up. This is so much more convenient. You also have more flexibility with the traction amount you want to use. Easy to use and great for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Rmmystic

customer_reviews.title: This product is awesome! It helped relieve constant neck pain I’ve had ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome! It helped relieve constant neck pain I’ve had from years of playing sports and commuting to work. I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk Feldkamp

customer_reviews.title: price
customer_reviews.text: For my neck and and spine! I have only tried 2 times since I got it. I think it would be good if you have neck pain !
customer_reviews.author: jorge

customer_reviews.title: Great inflatable brace!
customer_reviews.text: I use this product multiple times a week. Works just like day one. I would recommend to anyone who has neck strains.
customer_reviews.author: joseph

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This device is top notch. The quality is much better than first one I had. Much sturdier and softer. Highly recommend spending the little extra money this costs. The carry pouch is a nice little added touch.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Byrne

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use; portable
customer_reviews.text: This little device is so much easier to use than an inversion table and costs much less. So far, it's worked well. I wouldn't recommend using for long periods of time. Short time intervals work best.
customer_reviews.author: kristi sexton

customer_reviews.title: Trusted Cervical Neck Traction Device
customer_reviews.text: Was hard to figure out a first. My doctor was able to get it to work right after sometime. Works great now!
customer_reviews.author: Laura T. Mercier

customer_reviews.title: Got this for my boyfriend. He loves it.
customer_reviews.text: He seems to like it a lot but I think he looks like one of those African tribal women. 🤷🏽‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Erin22

customer_reviews.title: Already sprung a leak!
customer_reviews.text: This item already broke less than two months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: MADE IN CHINA
customer_reviews.text: Dont be fooled by their product name, their pictures, or any of their attempts to fool you in thinking that this isn't made in China. As soon as you open the package it clearly states "MADE IN CHINA".
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: No longer works
customer_reviews.text: Used this a total of 10 days. Bulb pump no longer re-inflates.
customer_reviews.author: Pam H

customer_reviews.title: Good product, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service, they stand behind their product. This has really helped me with my chronic neck pain and I can't go anywhere without taking this with me!! Highly recommend this traction device and would recommend buying from this company as they really do stand behind their product!!
customer_reviews.author: Ankur Desai

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised Well made and stable product and packaging
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised Well made and stable product and packaging
customer_reviews.author: ThePAWsterMom

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this piece of garbage
customer_reviews.text: Another totally useless product. I would love to know who gave this piece of crap 5 stars.. I have a pinched nerve and this crap item did nothing but make it flare up and hurt worse.. Once again... Amazon 5 star joke.... Amazon you suck....
customer_reviews.author: Jec

customer_reviews.title: Great for my big neck
customer_reviews.text: This is my second product from this distributor and I once again am very happy. I had trouble finding a collar that fit my large neck (18 1/2). This fit great and had room to spare I think. It tucked in right under the jaw bones so it was quite comfortable. Well made as well and I expect that it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Barret

customer_reviews.title: Cervical neck traction is not one size fits all. ...
customer_reviews.text: Cervical neck traction is not one size fits all. When I wore it for few minutes, my neck started hurting more. It may have been okay for others but not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Zakia Isad

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend
customer_reviews.text: I used this and it caused my neck to itch a lot and it seem to cause more pain in my neck because of the angle it was lifting my head. I wouldn't recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it to feel good!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the way my neck feels!! Been a big help for me and my stepson!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far it seems to help with pain from protruding disc.
customer_reviews.author: JDH

customer_reviews.title: Great product not a cure but great reliever of pain and mobility for me
customer_reviews.text: I heat my neck with heating pad and put the collar on and increase pressure for about 5 minutes while I watch TV in the evening. I put a cold pack on my neck after that and my neck muscles dont hurt if I do this at least every other day. This is the only solution I have found to keep my neck from pinching and getting stiff.
customer_reviews.author: jimmy buchanan

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several neck brace and traction devices, and they all seemed to do the job great. This one worked just as well. I did love the fact that you can adjust or pump it up to your desire.
customer_reviews.author: OMGitsCMG

customer_reviews.title: AHHHHHH Relief!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 bad bulging disks with pinched nerves at C5-C6 and C6-C7. I have pain that shoots down my arm to my fingers. I got instant relief. So far it's only temporary for but it should help allow the disks to go back where they belong
customer_reviews.author: David Vaughan

customer_reviews.title: This device works!
customer_reviews.text: I am a teacher and so am bent over or looking down a lot. I started experiencing neck stiffness and pain. My massage therapist suggested that I find a device to help stretch my neck. After reading other reviews, I decided to give this traction device a try. The relief was immediate! I would recommend it for anyone experiencing neck pain.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Boardman-Rackley

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: My neck and my wifes neck felt better after the first time of use. My neck has been giving me problems and I believe this will help alot

customer_reviews.text: This neck traction is a great device to stretch or help straightened the neck & helps with stiff neck feeeling

customer_reviews.title: Helps with Neck Pain
customer_reviews.text: Just started using my traction collar. It's been great!! It's helped with my ear pain related to my arthritis in my neck. Thanks for carrying An American Made Product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley K. Pollman

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work properly
customer_reviews.text: It only inflated once. Deflated about halfway to take it off. Tried to use again, and will not inflate
customer_reviews.author: Les Pitre

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I like this one better then the contraption my doctor wanted me to use.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable traction device. Very soft.
customer_reviews.text: Not made in USA! From China! I have lost count in the number of the most popular traction devices that I have bought on-line. My wife likes this model the best. The material is very soft.
customer_reviews.author: KaRoe

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't actually provide traction as it puts downward pressure oh ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't actually provide traction as it puts downward pressure oh the shoulders and lower neck as it's inflated. for my condition quite painful
customer_reviews.author: Bill D

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy with this product.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Alleviated neck pain within a couple of days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have been using this device on and off for months now and it has held up great. Super easy to use and take to work
customer_reviews.text: Extremely helpful. I have been using this device on and off for months now and it has held up great. Super easy to use and take to work. It provides much needed relief and I've saved a good amount of money from not having to go to the chiropractor as much. Great company and product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, works as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, wife is getting better mobility and less neck pain and stiffness. It is slow to pump up.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne T.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The device functioned as advertised. Easy to use, fits well, inflates and deflates properly. I've only used it a couple of times, so can't tell you let how about effectiveness of the traction or durability of the device.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar Santos

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great!
customer_reviews.text: Relieved my neck pain after about a week or so. Now use it a few times a week to maintain.

customer_reviews.title: Good for average neck.
customer_reviews.text: Not too comfortable. I have a long thin neck so it doesn't work well for me.

customer_reviews.title: No relief

product_meta.title: Trusted Cervical Neck Traction Device - One Size Fits All Necks - US Owned FDA Registered - Relief for Chronic Neck & Shoulder Alignment Pain - Inflatable Neck Stretcher Collar for Home Relief
feature_bullets: 🇺🇸 Family Owned & Operated U S Company With Unmatched Customer Support

HELP IS ON THE WAY! - Whether you suffer from pinched nerve, herniated disks, regular arthritis in neck, compressed disks, arthritis, spasms, osteoarthritis, degenerative disc, cervical stenosis, migraine, bulging discs, poor posture, cervical radiculitis, osteaoarthritis, spondylosis, fused neck, radiculopathy, upper neck muscle tightness, aging neck, or just want a inexpensive realignment alternative to chiropractic and physical therapy, we are here to help.

REMARKABLE RESULTS! - Do you stare at a computer, work behind a desk or table all day just to come home to a horrible tense headache and have trouble sleeping? Well you have found your instant treatment solution! That's right, our comfortable and EASY TO USE neck support cervic traction pillows elongates neck muscles, often resulting in rapid decrease and prolonged relief from stress, migraines and stiff tension headaches.

ONE OF A KIND! - The problem with other traction devices is they do not fit everyone. Our adjustable air support pillow solves that problem! How? Well we listened to everyone's complaints and we extended our straps over 50% longer than everyone else. We also increased the velcro surface to give you a secure hold every time! The longer straps and velcro provide a larger surface to adhere to, which provides you with better fit and you do not have to worry about it ripping open while in use.

PRACTICAL! - Our product is portable, lightweight and so easy to use that you will be able to use it while watching tv, working, or walking around your house. This is great because you will no longer have to sit in a chair looking at a door while doing a stretch. Even take it on business travel to decompress after a long day or on vacations if the family is giving you migraines..haha

100% GUARANTEED! - Unlike other traction devices that use cheap materials, lightweight stitching, fake photoshopped images, and thin plastic shut off valves to save money, our product features an UNMATCHED GUARANTEE which means that you are guaranteed years of use. We utilize the softest flannel combined with heavy duty stitching for long lasting durable use with a stainless steel valve to guarantee proper shut off without leaks. That's why our traction collar is the #1 choice for Amazon buyers!
